title: E24 A Ouija Board PSA and Lessons on Limes
description:
Welcome to the smooth sounds of episode 24, in which Em and Christine most likely summon ZoZo the Ouija Board demon by accident and go on to talk about a demon in his own right, the family annihilator Xavier Dupont de Ligonnes, who killed his family and vanished in 2011.
Lessons learned this week include: 1) Stop playing with Ouija boards, and 2) Lime is a type of rock.
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (Kast Media)
